params.comission: percentage of the rewards that will be sent to the provider
params.provider: Account on behalf of this contract

isRegisteredRewardReceiver(address).details: helper function users can call to check anytime before calling fundValidators()

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

retrieveETH().details: Retrieve any mistakenly sent funds to this contract

rewardReceiverImpl().details: Returns the implementation of the Reward Receiver Contract.

updateRewardReceiverImpl(address).details: Updates the implementation of the Reward Receiver Contract

params.newRewardReceiverImpl: the implementation of the Reward Receiver Contract

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

deployNewRewardReceiver(address,address,.notice: creates a contract that will receive the rewards

fundValidators((bytes,bytes,bytes,bytes3.notice: funds a set of validators with specified ETH amounts (32-2048 ETH each)

initialize(address).notice: initilizes the owner and the implementation of the rewardReceiverContract
